login.title: Questionnaire Platform
login.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters and contain both letters and numbers
login.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
login.nameOnlyLetters: Name can only contain letters, hyphens, spaces and apostrophes

citizen.title: Welcome, {{fullName}}
citizen.morningDescription: Fill out your morning questionnaire to record your sleep

advisor.title: Advisor Dashboard
advisor.citizensDescription: View overview of citizens and their responses
advisor.eveningDescription: Edit evening questionnaire with conditional logic

questionnaire.question: Question {{current}} of {{total}} ({{percentage}}%)
questionnaire.mustAnswerPrevious: You must answer previous questions first
questionnaire.mustAnswerAll: You must answer all questions before proceeding
questionnaire.sleepTimeError: You cannot have fallen asleep ({{sleepTime}}) before going to bed ({{bedTime}}). Please check your answers.
questionnaire.sleepTimeErrorMinutes: You cannot have fallen asleep before going to bed. Number of minutes must be positive.
questionnaire.wakeTimeError: You cannot have gotten out of bed ({{outOfBedTime}}) before waking up ({{wakeTime}}). Please check your answers.
questionnaire.lightOffTimeError: You cannot have turned off the light ({{lightOffTime}}) before going to bed ({{bedTime}}). Please check your answers.
questionnaire.question6Error: If you woke up during the night, you must also specify how long you were awake. The value cannot be 0.
questionnaire.question6Missing: If you woke up during the night, you must also specify both how many times and how many minutes you were awake. Please navigate to question {{question6Order}} and fill it out.

review.intro: Please review all your answers before submitting. You can click "Edit" to go back and modify a question.

questionInput.maxLength: Text must be at most {{max}} characters
questionInput.question6MaxValueWhenQuestion5IsZero: If you did not wake up during the night, you cannot have been awake for more minutes. The value must be 0.
questionInput.question6DisabledWhenQuestion5IsZero: This field is locked because you did not wake up during the night
questionInput.question6HintWhenQuestion5IsZero: Since you did not wake up during the night, the value is automatically set to 0

editor.title: {{type}} Editor
editor.defaultNoNegative: If not specified, no negative values are allowed by default
editor.lockedCannotDelete: This question is locked and cannot be deleted
editor.lockedCannotEdit: This question is locked and cannot be edited
editor.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this question?

colorCode.enable: Enable color codes for advisor view
colorCode.description: Color codes help advisors identify values that require attention
colorCode.greenDescription: Values between these (inclusive of both numbers) are shown in green
colorCode.yellowDescription: Values between these (inclusive of both numbers) are shown in yellow
colorCode.redDescription: Values between these (inclusive of both numbers) are shown in red

userOverview.title: Citizens Overview
userOverview.noSleepDataMessage: No sleep data available for this period.
